statements: SELECT * FROM customer_sales;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date, product_id, product_category FROM customer_sales;
SELECT product_category, purchase_amount, customer_id, purchase_date, product_id FROM customer_sales;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_sales ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_category FROM customer_sales WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount, product_id, product_category FROM customer_sales WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_sales WHERE purchase_amount > 500 ORDER BY customer_id, purchase_date
SELECT product_id, product_category, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_amount FROM customer_sales GROUP BY product_id, product_category HAVING avg_amount > 1000 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_category, COUNT(*) AS num_of_purchases FROM customer_sales WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY product_category ORDER BY num_of_purchases DESC

SELECT customer_id, product_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_sales GROUP BY customer_id, product_id HAVING total_purchase_amount < 5000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, product_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT prediction_id, predicted_sale_amount, prediction_date FROM sales_prediction WHERE prediction_date = '2022-06-01'
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, prediction_date FROM sales_prediction WHERE predicted_sale_amount >= 500 ORDER BY prediction_date
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history JOIN sales_prediction ON customer_purchase_history.customer_id = sales_prediction.customer_id
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_phone LIKE '(555)%';
SELECT product_name, price, product_category FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, ph.purchase_date FROM Customer c JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN Product p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT sales_id, revenue, discount FROM sales WHERE discount IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sales_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT customer_name, product_name, revenue FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN sales ON orders.order_id = sales.order_id WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_date, status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE signup_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_date, trend_description FROM sales_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
